data.message: well he obviously stirs up feelings either way, hate or love, hey give him credit for at least starting conversations between humans if nothing else, for three seconds or 2 minutes, somebody isn't just snapping dick pics or trying to get laid by a stranger or b.s. like that. I am a Stan from Hell though and love the shit outta him, he's funny, an asshole, a thug, a teacher, insightful, confused, got $, still poor.... all that and an order of bk onion rings. Have it your way, and good day. thank u for the pic!
